To create the 1024x1024 app icon for Facebook Developer Console:

1. Go to Canva.com
2. Create custom size: 1024x1024 pixels
3. Add gradient background: #4F46E5 (top-left) to #7C3AED (bottom-right)
4. Add stethoscope emoji ðŸ©º (large, centered, approximately 512x512 pixels)
5. Add 'Surgly' text below in white, bold font (size ~120px)
6. Download as PNG
7. Upload to Facebook Developer Console > Settings > App Icon

Alternative: Use any design tool (Figma, Photoshop, AI image generator)

Required specifications:
- Size: Exactly 1024x1024 pixels
- Format: PNG
- Background: Gradient from #4F46E5 to #7C3AED
- Center icon: Medical stethoscope or medical cross
- Text: "Surgly" in white below icon
